posts.body:
>Script blockers can have a terrible effect on basic site functions.  Make sure you whitelist the site in Noscript and other systems.
If you want to browse around Zeronet, I do recommend blocking all resources to 3rd party sites. That basically means blocking all images,css,scripts,etc that aren't coming from localhost. Some people prefer to use a dedicated browser or a separate browser profile to achieve this. Or you can just configure uMatrix to behave that way for you.
